thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Accountant - Sports Media

title: Accountant - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-09-2015 Brief Job Description: Prepare/post monthly journal entries as part of monthly and quarterly close in accordance with GAAP. Prepare monthly balance sheet account reconciliations, ensuring that account balances are properly supported and appropriately recorded in accordance with GAAP and company policies.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
